name: Kalamkari Cotton Bed Sheet - Traditional Black
description: Traditional hand-painted kalamkari cotton bed sheet featuring intricate geometric patterns from Andhra Pradesh artisans. Made with natural dyes.

name: Kalamkari Cotton Bed Sheet - Ethnic Motifs
description: Elegant hand-block printed bed sheet with traditional ethnic motifs and natural dyes. Perfect for a heritage-themed bedroom.

name: Dashavatharam with Seetha Rama Panel
description: Beautiful kalamkari wall hanging featuring intricate floral patterns. Hand-painted by skilled artisans using traditional techniques.

name: Kalamkari Dupatta - Burgundy
description: Elegant hand-block printed dupatta in rich burgundy with traditional kalamkari patterns. Made with premium cotton.

name: Brass-Drum-Planter
description: Handcrafted brass Ganesha statue with intricate detailing. Perfect for home decor and religious ceremonies.

name: Bronze Nataraja Sculpture
description: Exquisite bronze Nataraja sculpture depicting Lord Shiva's cosmic dance. Traditional lost-wax casting technique.

name: Sandalwood Carved Box
description: Intricately carved sandalwood jewelry box with traditional motifs. Aromatic and beautifully crafted.

name: Kondapalli Toy Set - Dasavataram
description: Traditional Kondapalli wooden toy set depicting the ten avatars of Lord Vishnu. Hand-painted with natural colors.

name: Etikoppaka Wooden Toy - Elephant
description: Colorful wooden elephant toy made using traditional Etikoppaka lacquer toy making technique. Safe for children.

name: Leather Puppet - Ravana
description: Traditional leather shadow puppet of Ravana. Hand-painted and articulated. Great for collectors and cultural displays.

name: Bamboo Basket Set - 3 Pieces
description: Handwoven bamboo basket set in three different sizes. Perfect for storage and home organization.

name: Palm Leaf Wall Art
description: Artistic palm leaf wall decor featuring traditional designs. Eco-friendly and unique.

name: Terracotta Diya Set - 12 Pieces
description: Traditional handmade terracotta diyas. Perfect for festivals and decorative purposes.

name: Hand Knotted Carpet - Persian Design
description: Luxurious hand-knotted carpet with intricate Persian-inspired design. Premium quality wool.

name: Silver Filigree Necklace
description: Exquisite silver filigree necklace with traditional design. Handcrafted by skilled artisans.

name: Kalamkari Saree - Pure Cotton
description: Elegant pure cotton saree with hand-painted kalamkari designs. Perfect for festive occasions.

name: Brass Oil Lamp - Traditional
description: Traditional brass oil lamp (diya) for religious ceremonies and home decor. Handcrafted with intricate designs.

name: Painted Wooden Door Panel
description: Hand-carved and painted wooden door panel featuring traditional motifs. Excellent for interior decoration.

name: Kalamkari Table Runner
description: Beautiful kalamkari table runner to add an ethnic touch to your dining area. Hand-block printed.

name: Bronze Dancing Lady Sculpture
description: Graceful bronze sculpture of a dancing lady in traditional attire. Lost-wax casting technique.
